name: vscode-taskexplorer
description: Tasks and Scripts GUI | Visual UI for easy execution and management of tasks and scripts

walkthroughs.title: Get Started with Task Explorer
walkthroughs.description: Run, track, view and organize all of your project scripts and tasks

steps.title: Read Tutorial
steps.description:
Read the Welcome / New Release Page.

[Open Welcome Page](command:taskexplorer.view.welcome.show?false "Read the Welcome / New Release page")

steps.title: Customize your experience with a variety of settings
steps.description:
An organized settings section to easily customize the way Task Explorer works.

[Open Settings](command:taskexplorer.openSettings "Open the Task Explorer Settings section")

steps.title: Support development by purchasing a license
steps.description:
Support ongoing development by purchasing a license.

[Learn about Task Explorer licensing](command:taskexplorer.view.licensePage.show?false "Open the Licensing details page")

commands.title: Task Explorer: Show Log in Output Window

explorer/context.when: taskexplorer:enabled && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath in taskexplorer:fileCache:taskFiles
taskexplorer:enabled && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath not in taskexplorer:fileCache:taskFiles
taskexplorer:enabled && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath in taskexplorer:fileCache:taskFiles
taskexplorer:enabled && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourcePath && resourceScheme == folder
taskexplorer:enabled && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath not in taskexplorer:fileCache:taskFiles
taskexplorer:enabled && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourcePath && resourceScheme == folder

taskexplorer:enabled && config.taskexplorer.enableExplorerView && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath in taskexplorer:fileCache:scriptFiles

taskexplorer:enabled && config.taskexplorer.enableExplorerView && explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath in taskexplorer:tasks:scriptFilesWithArgs

beginsPattern.regexp: ^\[(?:0|1)\] \d{1,2}\:\d{1,2}\:\d{1,2} (?:AM|PM) \- (Starting compilation in watch mode|File change detected\. Starting incremental compilation)\.\.\.

endsPattern.regexp: ^\[(?:0|1)\] \d{1,2}\:\d{1,2}\:\d{1,2} (?:AM|PM) \- (?:Compilation complete\.|Found \d+ errors?\.) Watching for file changes\.

pattern.regexp:
^The terminal process *["']?([A-Za-z\.0-9\/\-_\\]+) +([A-Za-z \.0-9\/\-_\\"']+) +(?:failed to launch \(|terminated with )exit code\:? *([0-9]+)\s*(?:\.|\))[
]{2,3}^(.+)
^('(.+)' is not recognized as an internal or external command)
